train_confirm.title: Start Training?
train_confirm.description:
Are you sure? This will start a 24-hour background process for **{name}**.

Ensure the sensors are physically next to each other before proceeding.

settings_signal.title: Signal Processing Configuration
settings_signal.description: Fine-tune how the sensor data is processed *after* calibration is applied.

data_description.floor: The sensor will never report a value lower than this number. Useful for sensors that drop to 0 too early.
data_description.ceiling: The sensor will never report a value higher than this number. Useful for clamping humidity at 100%.
data_description.logarithmic: Recommended for Lux sensors. Makes low-light changes more perceptible, matching human vision.
data_description.smoothing: Averages readings over time to remove sudden spikes (e.g., a bird flying over solar sensor). 0 to disable.
data_description.deadzone: Ignores changes smaller than this percentage to prevent noisy updates and database clutter.
data_description.thermal_lag: For slow-to-respond temperature sensors (e.g., in plastic cases). Predicts the real value ahead of time.
data_description.altitude: For pressure sensors only. Adjusts reading to Mean Sea Level based on your current elevation.
